description: Cost metrics from the Kubecost product

options.content: Note: this dashboard requires Kubecost metrics to be available in your Prometheus deployment. [Learn more](https://github.com/kubecost/cost-model/blob/master/PROMETHEUS.md)

panels.description: Monthly run rate of CPU + GPU costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
)

panels.title: CPU Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of memory costs based on currently provisioned expenses.
panels.title: Memory Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached storage and PV costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
(sum(sum (node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="node-exporter", fstype!="", fstype!="tmpfs"}) by (instance)) /1024 /1024 /1024)  * $localStorageGBCost

panels.title: Storage Cost

panels.description: Sum of compute, memory, storage and network costs.

targets.expr:
# Compute
avg_over_time( sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
)[$__range:]) +


# Memory
avg_over_time( sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
)[$__range:]) +

# Storage 

avg_over_time( sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster"})  by (persistentvolume) / (1024^3)) [$__range:])
+
avg_over_time(count(kube_node_info{cluster="$cluster"})[$__range:]) *  (avg(avg_over_time(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="node-exporter", fstype!="", fstype!="tmpfs"}[$__range]))  / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * $localStorageGBCost

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description: Current CPU use from applications divided by allocatable CPUs

targets.expr:
(
 sum(
   count(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
   * on (instance) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
 ) 
 / 
 (sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}))
) * 100

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Current CPU reservation requests from applications vs allocatable CPU

targets.expr: SUM(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) / SUM(kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) * 100

panels.title: CPU Requests

panels.description: Current RAM use vs RAM available

targets.expr: SUM(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}) / SUM(kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"}) * 100

panels.title: RAM Utilization

panels.description: Current RAM requests vs RAM available

targets.expr:
(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""})
 /
 sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"})
) * 100

panels.title: RAM Requests

panels.description: This gauge shows the current standard storage use, including cluster storage, vs storage available

targets.expr:
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(pod_pvc_allocation{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up{cluster="$cluster"} * 0
 + sum(container_fs_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) /
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up{cluster="$cluster"} * 0
 + sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{cluster="$cluster", device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) * 100

panels.title: Storage Utilization

panels.description: Monthly run rate of CPU + GPU costs

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730
)

panels.title: Compute Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of memory costs
panels.title: Memory Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached disk + PV storage costs

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(avg_over_time(pv_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) * 730 
  * avg(avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster"}[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
) +
sum(avg(container_fs_limit_bytes{cluster="$cluster", device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost

panels.title: Storage Cost

panels.description: Sum of compute, memory, and storage costs

targets.expr:
# Compute
sum(avg(avg_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core", job="kube-state-metrics"} [$__range])) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730) +


# Memory
sum(
  avg(avg_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte", job="kube-state-metrics"} [$__range])) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730  * (1-$useDiscount/100)
) +

# Storage 

sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
avg_over_time(count(kube_node_info{cluster="$cluster"})[$__range:]) *  (avg(avg_over_time(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="node-exporter", fstype!="", fstype!="tmpfs"}[$__range]))  / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * $localStorageGBCost

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description: Cost of by resource class of currently provisioned nodes

targets.expr: avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"} or up{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)

avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)

# CPU  
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"} or up{cluster="$cluster"} * 0) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
# GPU
avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
# Memory
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)

panels.title: Cost by node

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached disk + PV storage costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{cluster="$cluster", resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730 +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}) by (node) * 730
)

sum(
  avg(avg_over_time(pv_hourly_cost{cluster="$cluster"}[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) * 730 
  * avg(avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster"}[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
) +
sum(avg(container_fs_limit_bytes{cluster="$cluster", device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost
SUM(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", device="eth0"}[60m]) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * (60 * 60 * 24 * 30) * $percentEgress * $egressCost

panels.title: Cost by Resource

list.label: Cost per Gb hour for attached disks
list.name: localStorageGBCost

title: Services / Kubecost Overview
